title: Missouri State Income Tax Calculator | CalcDomain

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Let Gross be annual gross wages, PreTax be pre‑tax deductions, Ded be the deduction (standard or custom). Then: AGI = Gross − PreTax Missouri Taxable Income: TI = max(0, AGI − Ded) 2024 Missouri progressive tax (piecewise by bracket i with cap c_i and rate r_i): Tax(TI) = Σ over i [ max(0, min(TI, c_i) − c_{i−1}) × r_i ] , with c_0 = 0 For 2024, brackets (USD): 0%: 0–1,000; 2.0%: 1,001–2,000; 2.5%: 2,001–3,000; 3.0%: 3,001–4,000; 3.5%: 4,001–5,000; 4.0%: 5,001–6,000; 4.5%: 6,001–7,000; 4.8%: 7,001+ City earnings tax (optional): CityTax = Gross × 0.01 (if Kansas City or St. Louis) Effective rate: Eff = (StateTax + CityTax) / Gross

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
